mapper.sql: a.office_id AS "office.id", a.vend_name AS "vendName", a.cate_id AS "bizCategoryInfo.id", a.cate_name AS "cateName", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "status", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", o1.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o1 ON o1.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_vend_info( office_id, vend_name, cate_id, cate_name, code, status, u_version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{office.id}, #{vendName}, #{bizCategoryInfo.id}, #{cateName}, #{code}, #{status}, #{uVersion}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_vend_info SET vend_name = #{vendName}, cate_id = #{bizCategoryInfo.id}, cate_name = #{cateName}, code = #{code}, u_version = #{uVersion}, create_time = #{createDate}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE office_id = #{office.id}
